name: Blood Stream Panic
description:
Blood Stream Panic is a shoot em' up where you shoot parts of yourself to murder little bacteria cells. Get small enough, you die. Get big enough, it's easier to get hit.

This is a game made for my Game Design Fundamentals class by me and my friend Diane using processing (a stripped down java environment). I decided to put this here because hell, why not?

Also the loading screen doesn't actually load anything, it's just to show a quick tutorial on how to play the game.
